full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA LHA DGU LA BRTEN PA'I SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA SDIG SGRIB MUN 'JOMS NGAN SONG 'DREN BYED BYIN RLABS 'OD KYI ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA LHA DGU LA BRTEN PA'I SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA SDIG SGRIB MUN 'JOMS NGAN SONG 'DREN BYED BYIN RLABS 'OD KYI ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SKYES PA'I RABS DU MAR RGYAL BSTAN 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM GYI MTHU LEGS PAR GRUB PA AIL GO SANG AER TE NI MKHAN PO NO MON HANG RIN CHEN RDO RJE NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, BDAG MDUN GYI SKOR RJE GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS GSUNG LTAR @019B BKOD CING SMYUNG GNAS KYI CHO GA GZHAN LAS KYANG CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANGS TE, ^ BTZUN PA WA G'INDRA PA tU SIDDHIS KHU RE CHEN MOR BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI SHES RAB KYI MI GDANG LDAN PA SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
